EmailTemplate.name: 18-Aviation-AviationDG-Email-DubaiAir19Invite-T003RZ.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Nokia at the Airport Show/ATC Forum 2019, 29 April to 1 May, Dubai, UAE
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=customer}}, It is our pleasure to invite you to join Nokia at the Airport Show/ATC Forum 2019, 29 April to 1 May, in DICEC, Dubai, United Arab Emirates <[[https://www.nokia.com/about-us/events/calendar/airport-show-atc-forum/?did=d000000001je&utm_campaign=aviationdg&utm_source=email-list-aviation&utm_medium=email&utm_content=event&utm_term=invitation]]>. The aviation industry and its airport infrastructure provide a critical foundation and epicenter for the cultural, social and economic growth for our world. Exciting new digital technologies and strategies can help our aviation centers better perform, connect and prosper. The Airport Show/ATC Forum - 29 April to 1 May, 2019 - DICEC, Dubai, UAE - Nokia stand #5101 At the Airport Show/ATC Forum <[[https://www.nokia.com/about-us/events/calendar/airport-show-atc-forum/?did=d000000001je&utm_campaign=aviationdg&utm_source=email-list-aviation&utm_medium=email&utm_content=event&utm_term=invitation]]> in Dubai, we invite you to join us at stand #5101 where we look forward to sharing with you innovative technologies for mission-critical domestic, airport and international aviation networking as well as managed service options that can help both airports and air traffic control meet key regulatory and unique network communications upgrade challenges. We look forward to meeting you in Dubai! Best regards, The Nokia aviation team
For further information about Nokia’s aviation solutions, visit https://networks.nokia.com/industries/aviation <[[https://networks.nokia.com/industries/aviation/?did=d000000001je&utm_campaign=aviationdg&utm_source=email-list-aviation&utm_medium=email&utm_content=event&utm_term=invitation]]> © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[https://{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]>
